attributes.action: Ensure remaining UK and Afghan citizens entitled be evacuated from Afghanistan
attributes.additional_details:
Alot of Western Countries and US are still Evacuating their citizens and Afghan citizens from Afghanistan

Take Action and start evacuating stranded British Nationals and Afghan citizens as Promised by British Government. Was a Promise Fake  or a Genuine Promise. 

All the stranded British Nationals including ACRS / ARAP / dependents want to know.
attributes.background: The withdrawal from Afghanistan has left many British citizens/Afghan Citizens and those who served with NATO,stranded and facing imminent danger.The Government must be held accountable for and ensure those who were unable to be airlifted through Operation Pitting are able to exit Afghanistan safely

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596160
